# emilseman.github.io

Plugins USED -
  - jemoji -- smajliky v postoch --  napr v poste http://emilseman.github.io/blog/2016/02/25/zaciatok-github-pages
  - jekyll-mentions
  - jekyll-sitemap  -- vytvara sitemap.xml ==> emilseman.github.io/sitemap.xml
  - liquid_reading_time
Napr plugin zobrazujuci cas citania je vo vsetkych blog postoch

instalacia pluginov cez gem command line:
gem install liquid_reading_time
gem install jemoji
gem install jekyll-mentions
gem install jekyll-sitemap
